properties.entry: SELECT N.*, U.USER_NAME, T.TEAM_NAME FROM NEWS N JOIN USER_INFO U ON N.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN TEAMS T ON N.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE N.NEWS_NO = ? AND NEWS_ST = 'N'
UPDATE NEWS SET NEWS_TITLE = ?, TEAM_NO = ?, NEWS_PUBLISHER = ?, NEWS_CONTENT = ?, UPDATE_DT = DEFAULT WHERE NEWS_NO = ?
UPDATE NEWS_IMG SET IMG_RENAME = ?, IMG_ORIGINAL = ? WHERE NEWS_NO = ? AND IMG_LEVEL = ?
INSERT INTO NEWS VALUES( SEQ_NEWS_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, NULL )
SELECT SEQ_NEWS_NO.CURRVAL AS NEWS_NO FROM DUAL
UPDATE NEWS SET NEWS_ST = 'Y' WHERE NEWS_NO = ?

SELECT N.*, U.USER_NAME, T.TEAM_NAME, (SELECT NI.IMG_RENAME FROM NEWS_IMG NI WHERE N.NEWS_NO = NI.NEWS_NO AND NI.IMG_LEVEL = 1) AS NEWS_IMG FROM NEWS N JOIN USER_INFO U ON N.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN TEAMS T ON N.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE NEWS_ST = 'N'
UPDATE NEWS SET NEWS_VIEWS = NEWS_VIEWS + 1 WHERE NEWS_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT N.*, U.USER_NAME, T.TEAM_NAME, (SELECT NI.IMG_RENAME FROM NEWS_IMG NI WHERE N.NEWS_NO = NI.NEWS_NO AND NI.IMG_LEVEL = 1) AS NEWS_IMG FROM NEWS N JOIN USER_INFO U ON N.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN TEAMS T ON N.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE NEWS_ST = 'N' ORDER BY N.NEWS_VIEWS DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT N.*, U.USER_NAME, T.TEAM_NAME, (SELECT NI.IMG_RENAME FROM NEWS_IMG NI WHERE N.NEWS_NO = NI.NEWS_NO AND NI.IMG_LEVEL = 1) AS NEWS_IMG FROM NEWS N JOIN USER_INFO U ON N.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN TEAMS T ON N.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO WHERE NEWS_ST = 'N' ORDER BY N.NEWS_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 7
